content.data:
[Y]Did You Know?
[W]Little facts for big bragging rights.
[c][m.]
[W]The CPC keyboard is matrix scanned and
[W]tightly linked with the machine sound
[W]hardware.
[W]The mixed-chip design is quirky, but
[W]that quirk is where the tricks live.
[c][m.]
[G]- Z80 drives logic.
[G]- CRTC shapes timing.
[G]- Gate Array colours output.
[m][m-]
[Y]TRIVIA
[C]Many classic effects come from timing
[C]more than raw speed.
[c][m.]
[C]0 MAIN   [W]# HELP
